From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

In Megatrons blind fury rage, optics that looked as if they held the
burning inferno themselves, looked up at the Mutate. Through clenched
teeth oil dribbled down his face, a mask of rage. He aimed upwards, and
fired at the disgusting mix of robotic parts, assuming it was a Maximal.
"Die Maximal." He screamed, oil frothing from his beserked face. THe
beam of purple fusion energy hurtling towards Mutate.
----------------------------------------------------------------------
"Unit online." A small hum from a computer emmited from over where the
old Maximal city used to be.
